name: secondl1ght
description: Junior Web Developer at [Bleskomat](https://bleskomat.com) & [coinos](https://coinos.io) and contributing to other open source bitcoin projects, mainly [Alby](https://getalby.com). I am working towards becoming a full-time bitcoin dev!
